text: Hi everyone. I have a question regarding query parameters __hstc and __hssc. Does HubSpot attach these parameters to the URL when redirecting the user to an external page? Can anybody give me more information about this, because I haven't found any documentation for it? Thanks.
<@UQWGKUEN7> Can you please look into  the question above? Still haven't found an answer..

Reminder: Did you know you can message <@U02162GK9SP|sprocky> at any time to get HubSpot development questions answered? It’s an experimental chat bot built to tackle developer questions. It won’t read your code, but can answer a lot of questions about building on the HubSpot platform.

<@U03NSHL85DZ> I forgot that you cannot inline a number field but you can inline an text field and pass the value through the `int`  filter.

It would look something like this on the template

```{% text "my_text" value="25", export_to_template_context=True %}

{# would access the value from the field #} 
{{ widget_data.my_text.value|int }}```
Then you would set that value in each blog post that you wanted. And create any kind of logic you need to do the actual sorting of the blog posts based on this field.
